price: 47. Kaadu Nabiyow a-koros ken elle meesissa digaala nel oobis axcuk kot qataataktaah, Yalli isi xagna mamaka, kaadu diggah woo ayro (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) ku Rabbih xaqul addunyâ sanootay isin lowtaanak alfi sanatih inna kinni.
arabic: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِٱلۡعَذَابِ وَلَن يُخۡلِفَ ٱللَّهُ وَعۡدَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ يَوۡمًا عِندَ رَبِّكَ كَأَلۡفِ سَنَةٖ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayastaʿjilūnaka bil-ʿadhābi walan yukh'lifa al-lahu waʿdahu wa-inna yawman ʿinda rabbika ka-alfi sanatin mimmā taʿuddūna
translations: And they ask you to hasten
